title: ZipReg
author: ZipReg
created_time: July 02, 2022, 12:50:50 AMLast edit: July 02, 2022, 05:18:45 PM by ZipReg
content: Greetings everyone, I hope you're all doing well! If you missed out on the first prototype auction of this design concept, here is yourchance to try and grab one, as I have up for auction the 2nd and final prototype!I will be releasing a small numbered run of 16x20 canvas prints, this auction is to help fund that.The concept of the piece: "THE TIMES TRAVELER"In the future the secret of time travel is discovered. A time traveler goes back in time and convincesThe Times to run an alternate front page article on Jan. 3rd 2009 after revealing to them the bitcoin whitepaper,source code and genesis block code that embeds the famous "Chancellor on brink of second bailout" headlinethat had yet to be printed! Replacing the Israel sends troops into Gaza headline with the message from averified time traveler that bitcoin would become the future world currency, right above the bank bailout headline!This changes history forever, as on the same day Satoshi launched the bitcoin blockchain, the entire civilizedworld would now learn of bitcoin's existence and destiny as the future world currency.This #002 prototype is a 1" frame wrapped 16x20 canvas, with a process done to embolden text.The result is pleasing, but I feel it did not retain the same authenticity of the original design."THE TIMES TRAVELER"PROTOTYPE #002 1" Wrapped 16"x20" CanvasStarting bid: 0.001BTCBid Increments: 0.0001BTCEnd date and time:  Thursday, July 7th. 2022 at 7pm EST. Countdown TimerShipping: Actual cost paid by winner. Any Import/VAT taxes are to be paid by winner.Sniping: Any bid made within the last 5 minutes of the auctionwill extend the auction 5 minutes, any additional bid within thatextended time shall further extend the auction 5 additional minutes.Excluded from Bidding: I may exclude any bidder at my sole discretion. Payment: Will PM winner with payment detailsThank You & Good Luck!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on July 02, 2022, 11:24:13 AM0.0026BTCCurrent high bid!Thanks for the support guys! Just updated OP with pic of cert.  I neglected to add a cert pic to the #001 proto auction for some reason, rest assured all pieces come with their own COA. Thanks again!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: thiago007 on July 03, 2022, 01:09:22 PM0.003 BTCCurrent high bid!I greatly appreciate the support everyone, thanks again!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Fun fact bump! Back in 2019 when I came up with this concept, I created a bip38 walled prototype using the design and held a crypto puzzle contest here in collectibles.The first person to figure out the password got the $21 worth of BTC in the wallet, plus the prototype wallet and pass card.

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: Dernoste on July 05, 2022, 11:22:45 PM0.0031 BTCCurrent high bid! This auction ends tomorrow    Thanks again everyone and Good Luck!

comments.body: Quote from: Dernoste on July 05, 2022, 11:22:45 PM0.0031 BTCCurrent winning bid!Ends Today in less than 10 Hrs!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Less than 1 HR remaining in final prototype auciton!    Thanks & Good Luck!
